Reviews.Title: Good Laptop
Reviews.Author: Kevin Guthrie
Reviews.Content: I own a Toshiba Satellite already, so it was an easy choice to make when I  purchased this one for son  for college.

Reviews.Title: Check the Processor Speed
Reviews.Author: Afshin
Reviews.Content: You better check the processor and all the internal components against the specifications they provide. I bought a 2.7 GHz processor but received a 1.8 GHz one.I am sending this back for a full refund.

Reviews.Title: Excelent laptop !
Reviews.Author: Denise
Reviews.Content: Excelent laptop, im an engineer and it's perfect to support all my programs and it's also a nice model and not heavy

Reviews.Title: Laptop looks good and gets the job done!
Reviews.Author: Mark Cheek
Reviews.Content: This machine performs with speed and has good digital imagery.  It is good for routine use and for video gaming.  This is a good entry level machine.

Reviews.Title: A Good lap
Reviews.Author: AHMED MUJUTHABA MOHAMED
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop about three weeks back..so far so good. Windows starts very quickly, sharp screen good wifi detection. Overall a very fast machine. The Sound is a bit cracked...but I think it can be worked out.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i5-3337U Dual-core processor
6 GB DDR3
750 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
15.6-Inch Screen, Mobile Intel HD graphics
Windows 8
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba Satellite L955-S5152 PSKGGU-01P003 15.6-Inch Laptop (Fusion Finish in Mercury Silver)
